title: Project Configuration (version 2.0)
description: Defines the bundles and list of externals for this project

bundles.description: A list of bundle definitions. Bundle names may be between 6 and 64 lowercase alphanumeric or dash characters.

components.description: An array of components to be included in this bundle.

items.description: A component definition, including the manifest and entrypoint.

entrypoint.description: The path to the code entrypoint for this component, relative to the project root.

manifest.description: The path to the manifest for this component, relative to the project root.

externals.description: A mapping of external bundles to the path to the bundled JS, used to create bundle config

oneOf.description: The path to the bundled external file

path.description: The path to the bundled external non-AMD file

globalName.description: The name of the global variable where an non-AMD dependency drops its exports

globalDependencies.description: List of non-AMD dependencies for this project

localizedResources.description: A set of localized resources, to be discovered following a specific pattern

^[a-zA-Z0-9\\.\\$_@/-]+$.description: The path to the localized resource file, relative to the root of the project
